allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Sportsbeams Pipeline Phase 1

Complete Phase 1 implementation including:
- Database schema with SQLAlchemy models \(Prospect, Contact, Score, Activity, etc.\)
- FastAPI backend with REST endpoints and WebSocket support
- Next.js 16 dashboard with prospects list, detail view, and import UI
- JSON import system for athletic-director-prospecting and contact-finder skills
- Watch folder for automatic file imports
- Seed data and development tooling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove watch folder import feature

Deleted scripts/watch_imports.py and related gitignore entries.
Manual import via dashboard is preferred for better tracking.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
